name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi対バン企画 LAST V STANDiNG vol.3 #LVS3【GUEST：MaiR】 [_qqd8XuHnUA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: AZKi performs the song 'overwritten' on a brightly lit 3D stage with floral petal effects.
AZKi performs the song 'Take me to Heaven'. The stage atmosphere changes to a more ethereal and atmospheric blue-toned lighting.

subtitles.original: ...たって
subtitles.english: ...even if I am.

subtitles.original: 伝えるよ ココロを今
subtitles.english: I'll tell you my heart right now.

subtitles.original: 共鳴するの 私のストーリー
subtitles.english: My story resonates.

subtitles.original: 名前を呼んで そばにいるから
subtitles.english: Call my name, because I'm by your side.

subtitles.original: 音を奏でよう 新しい世界
subtitles.english: Let's play the sound, a new world.

subtitles.original: キミに出会うために 生きていくんだ
subtitles.english: I'm living to meet you.

subtitles.original: この場所が 奇跡だから
subtitles.english: Because this place is a miracle.

subtitles.original: リアルを超えて 繋ぐよ
subtitles.english: Going beyond reality, I'll connect us.

subtitles.original: さあ
subtitles.english: Now!

subtitles.original: 夜は深く 眠りに落ちて
subtitles.english: The night falls into a deep sleep,

subtitles.original: やがて光が 世界を照らすよ
subtitles.english: And eventually light will illuminate the world.

subtitles.original: キミと出会えたこと 意味を見つけたのさ
subtitles.english: Meeting you, I found the meaning.

subtitles.original: 共に分かち合って 生きたい
subtitles.english: I want to live sharing it with you.

subtitles.original: 創造するの 私のストーリー
subtitles.english: I'll create my story.

subtitles.original: 声を聞かせて キミを知りたいから
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice, because I want to know you.

subtitles.original: 開拓するの 新しい世界
subtitles.english: I'll pioneer a new world.

subtitles.original: 嘘じゃないんだ キミとのストーリー
subtitles.english: It's not a lie, the story with you.

subtitles.original: 全てが始まる この場所で
subtitles.english: Everything begins in this place.

subtitles.original: 歌を歌い続けるよ
subtitles.english: I will keep singing.

subtitles.original: Ah
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: Take me to Heaven
subtitles.english: Take me to Heaven

subtitles.original: 宇宙の最後の日 奏でる最後の歌
subtitles.english: Thinking about the last day of the universe, the last song to be played,

subtitles.original: のこと考えてる 知らないうちに
subtitles.english: without even knowing it.

subtitles.original: 引き継ぐ空気みたいに むしろ呪いみたいに
subtitles.english: Like the air I breathe in, or rather like a curse,

subtitles.original: いびつなほど かけがえなく そこにある
subtitles.english: distorted as it may be, it's there, irreplaceable.

subtitles.original: そう 息が止まる その瞬間まで
subtitles.english: Yes, until the moment my breath stops,

subtitles.original: この音楽に 溺れてたいの
subtitles.english: I want to be drowned in this music.

subtitles.original: Take me
subtitles.english: Take me

subtitles.original: 音のない世界じゃ この体はきっと
subtitles.english: In a world without sound, this body surely...

subtitles.original: Eternity
subtitles.english: Eternity

subtitles.original: ほんの少しだって 生きてちゃいられない
subtitles.english: I can't live for even a little while.

subtitles.original: だからもう
subtitles.english: So now...

subtitles.original: Take me to heaven 連れていって あのメロディが私を
subtitles.english: Take me to heaven, take me away, that melody leads me.

subtitles.original: Eternity
subtitles.english: Eternity

subtitles.original: まるで永遠みたいな音で呼んで
subtitles.english: Call me with a sound that's just like eternity.

subtitles.original: どうか Take me to heaven
subtitles.english: Please, take me to heaven.

subtitles.original: 一人で夜を越す日 信じる相手もいない
subtitles.english: Days spent alone through the night, with no one to believe in.

subtitles.original: どうしようもないくらい 長い夜に
subtitles.english: In a night so long that there's nothing I can do.

subtitles.original: 一生みたいなプレイリスト 迷路の出口いつも
subtitles.english: A playlist like a whole life, always the exit to the maze.

subtitles.original: 放り投げている 決してなくさぬように
subtitles.english: I keep throwing it out, so as never to lose it.

subtitles.original: 私は最後の日 抱える最初の答え
subtitles.english: On my last day, the first answer I hold...

subtitles.original: はきっとまだ 胸の中 心臓のように
subtitles.english: ...is surely still in my chest, like a heart.

subtitles.original: 引き継ぐ空気みたいに むしろ呪いみたいに
subtitles.english: Like the air I breathe in, or rather like a curse,

subtitles.original: いびつなほど かけがえなく そこにある
subtitles.english: distorted as it may be, it's there, irreplaceable.

subtitles.original: もう 何も他に望まないと誓って
subtitles.english: I swear I don't want anything else anymore,

subtitles.original: 一つだけ願いが 叶うのならば
subtitles.english: if only one wish could come true.

subtitles.original: もし 息が止まるその日は
subtitles.english: If the day my breath stops...
